underlying_goal: To configure the Zsh shell to automatically activate a Python virtual environment upon startup.
primary_success: Correctly identifying the right place in the user's complex zsh configuration to add the venv activation call and then accurately diagnosing a follow-up 'command not found' issue as expected behavior.
brief_summary: User wanted to auto-activate venvs on shell startup. Claude correctly modified the `zshrc.sh` file. When the user noted a command was not found, Claude correctly explained this was expected behavior as no venv was present in that specific directory, resolving the user's confusion.
